### 👋 Hi Here! 

- 🏆 一位普通的 *MCGA* 开发者，自学编程的**学牲党**，比较喜欢折腾，熟悉但**不精通**编程
- 🎰 投喂渠道：[⚡爱发电](https://afdian.net/@MreAt) | 但愿老死电脑间，不愿鞠躬老板前
- 📫 联系方式：[![Telegram](https://img.shields.io/badge/Telegram-blue?style=flat-square&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://t.me/MreAtKC) [![微博](https://img.shields.io/badge/Weibo-orange?style=flat-square&logo=Sina%20Weibo&logoColor=ffffff)](https://weibo.com/MreAtKC) [![酷安](https://img.shields.io/badge/Coolapk-4caf50?style=flat-square&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](http://www.coolapk.com/u/19402629) [![Youtube](https://img.shields.io/badge/Youtube-ff0000?style=flat-square&logo=Youtube&logoColor=ffffff)](https://www.youtube.com/@MreAtKC) [![哔哩哔哩](https://img.shields.io/badge/Bilibili-00a1d6?style=flat-square&logo=Bilibili&logoColor=ffffff)](https://space.bilibili.com/2108295476) [![Steam](https://img.shields.io/badge/Steam-071a39?style=flat-square&logo=Steam&logoColor=ffffff)](https://steamcommunity.com/id/MreAt) 
- 🧱 出于**爱好**，我会在 *GitHub* 上开源些小项目，写代码是热爱，写到世间充满爱
